description: Provides information about the Regions that are configured for multi-Region replication.

nested_items.name: RegionsDescription
nested_items.description: List of Region information related to the directory for each replicated Region.

nested_items.name: RegionName
nested_items.description: The name of the Region. For example, us-east-1.

nested_items.name: RegionType
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the Region is the primary Region or an additional Region.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the replication process for the specified Region.

nested_items.name: VpcSettings
nested_items.description: Contains VPC information for the  CreateDirectory or  CreateMicrosoftAD operation.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the VPC in which to create the directory.

nested_items.name: SubnetIds
nested_items.description: The identifiers of the subnets for the directory servers. The two subnets must be in different Availability Zones. Directory Service creates a directory server and a DNS server in each of these subnets.

nested_items.name: DesiredNumberOfDomainControllers
nested_items.description: The desired number of domain controllers in the specified Region for the specified directory.

nested_items.name: LaunchTime
nested_items.description: Specifies when the Region replication began.

nested_items.name: StatusLastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the Region status was last updated.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the Region description was last updated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If not null, more results are available. Pass this value for the NextToken parameter in a subsequent call to  DescribeRegions to retrieve the next set of items.
